The Importance of Being Accurate: SSDP Diffraction Attacks, UDP Refraction Attacks, and UPnP NAT Bypass

Written by Roland Dobbins, ASERT Principal Engineer & Matt Bing, ASERT Security Analyst. In this article: SSDP Diffraction Attacks aren’t new; they’ve been observed in the wild since 2015. ‘Evasive Amplification’ attacks, aren’t. UPnP NAT Bypass is real. SSDP Diffraction Attacks - Targeting
